This was our absolutely best vacation ever, for each and everyone of us. We were looking for a good family hotel with lots of activities for the whole family and that was exactly what we got!

June 2016

Alan Jones

I was looking for a nice hotel, but with various activities when staying there. Boy, was I surprised! California was anything but boring and all the things I did and places I visited was well worth it!

July 2016

Adrianne White

The best vacation for me and my fiancee, and a very affordable I might add! I throughly enjoyed every day at the beach, and every minute in the room, restaurant, everywhere! I can recommend this to everyone!

AUGUST 2016

Jenna & mike
